title: "IIIT-H builds multi-lingual speech recognition system"
excerpt: "Though speech recognition solutions are available, they are mostly language-specific, making it difficult to identify, transcribe and analyse the data. Researchers at the International Institute of Information Technology (IIIT-H) have found a workable solution to this problem."
